title: Subchapter A - State Lottery
content:
Subchapter A - State Lottery

State Regulations

Part 5000 - General Provisions (§ 5000.1 to 5000.8)

Part 5001 - Lottery Sales Agents (§ 5001.1 to 5001.29)

Part 5002 - Payment of Prizes (§ 5002.1 to 5002.13)

Part 5003 - Games (§ 5003.1 to 5003.3)

Part 5004 - Draw Games (§ 5004.1 to 5004.9)

Part 5005 - Lottery Subscriptions (§ 5005.1 to 5005.10)

Part 5006 - New York Instant Lottery (§ 5006.1 to 5006.14)

Part 5007 - Multi-Jurisdictional Lottery Games (§ 5007.1 to 5007.16)

Part 5008 - Lotto (§ 5008.1 to 5008.16)

Part 5009 - New York's Numbers (§ 5009.1 to 5009.4)

Part 5010 - Win-4 (§ 5010.1 to 5010.3)

Part 5011 - Pick-10 (§ 5011.1 to 5011.5)

Part 5012 - Take Five (§ 5012.1 to 5012.7)

Part 5013 - Quick Draw (§ 5013.1 to 5013.4)

Part 5014 - Courier Services (§ 5014.1 to 5014.20)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 5000 - General Provisions (§ 5000.1 to 5000.8)
